appraisers.name: Ellen Amirkhan – Rug Care Specialists Association

business.pricing: Estate packages begin at $450 and include research, inspection, and documentation.

content.about: Ellen Amirkhan – Rug Care Specialists Association provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Fine Art. With Not specified experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Santa Fe area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Nancy R.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Nancy M.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: Michael B.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

business.yearsInBusiness: Established firm with more than 12 years of specialized appraisal practice.
business.pricing: Initial consultation from $150; comprehensive reports quoted per project.

content.about: Sandbar Trading Co. provides professional antique appraisal services specializing in Oriental rugs, tribal textiles. With Established business experience, we offer expert valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the Santa Fe area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Nancy W.
reviews.content: Good service overall, though the turnaround time for my antique appraisal was longer than expected.

reviews.author: Karen C.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend them for any antique appraisal needs.

reviews.author: John C.
reviews.content: Professional service with good attention to detail, but would have appreciated more explanation about my antique furniture valuation methodology.

business.pricing: Estate packages begin at $450 and include research, inspection, and documentation.

content.about: Santa Fe Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Santa Fe area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Elizabeth S.
reviews.content: I needed an appraisal for a charitable donation of my antique collection, and Santa Fe Antique Appraisals delivered excellent service. All tax requirements were met perfectly.

reviews.author: Jessica S.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: David B.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: Nancy W.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.
